Carrier Pigeons - Carrier pigeons are trained birds that can be used to carry messages over long distances. They are a reliable and secure means of communication, as they can fly over obstacles and can be trained to return to their home location. Confidence score: 0.8

Homing Pigeons - Similar to carrier pigeons, homing pigeons are trained to return to their home location, making them a reliable means of communication. They can be used to carry messages over long distances, and their ability to navigate makes them a secure option. Confidence score: 0.9

Morse Code Flags - Morse code flags are a visual means of communication that use a series of flags to represent letters and numbers. They can be used to send messages over long distances, and can be used in conjunction with other means of communication, such as carrier pigeons or homing pigeons. Confidence score: 0.7

Smoke Signals - Smoke signals are a simple and ancient means of communication that use smoke to convey messages. They can be used over long distances, and can be seen by people in the vicinity. Confidence score: 0.6

Mirror Signals - Mirror signals are a means of communication that use mirrors to reflect sunlight and create a message. They can be used over long distances, and can be seen by people in the vicinity. Confidence score: 0.8
